website_summaries.verdict: Extremely durable set of holiday dishes that delivers service for 4.
pros: Low price point for 12 pieces of holiday dinnerware
Consists of 100% melamine, providing plates and bowls that resist chipping and scratching
Non-traditional artwork makes this set stand out
cons: Plates and bowls have a bit of texture to them

customer_reviews.title: Definitly pick these!!
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely extremely high quality! Heavier than most melamine, so not only do they look high quality, they feel high quality too. Gorgeous gorgeous dishes!!!!!!! Much more impressive in person than in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: 🍜 That Ramen chick 🍜

customer_reviews.title: rather pleased
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set because we needed to increase our place setting. We have the white porcelain set of same artwork and it seems they are no longer available. These are cute! lightweight plastic. My only critique is that the bowls don't really work with the artwork... but once used it doesn't really matter. I would prefer the heavier porcelain, but we miss-n-matched for gatherings and while odd, added to the fun a little.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted holiday plates but didn't want to spend a ton of money, I also didn't want ones that would break. I like the design and that there were no coffee cups. We do not drink coffee or tea very often so that would have been a waste of money. It is a nice set and was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: NewHouse32

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made plastic plates that are substantially over priced
customer_reviews.text: These plastic plates are not for adults who may use a knife to cut their food on them. They used the words Melange to hide the fact that these are cheap, very over priced plastic plates that I wouldn't recommend for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Holiday Addition
customer_reviews.text: This festive dishware set was an instant hit. They are easy to care for, light-weight, and add that extra touch of holiday spirit to your day. They arrived quickly and in excellent condition - a great bargain that I would buy again as a gift for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cute alternative to fancy/expensive dishware
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to entertain a couple for Christmas dinner for a whimsical and festive touch. Absolutely love them and our guests did too. Perfect o a red table cloth.
customer_reviews.author: HJB

customer_reviews.title: Tough Plates
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Christmas dinners with small grand kids. They are just about indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: Rick History

customer_reviews.title: Good looking on the table
customer_reviews.text: I gave this set to my wife for Christmas but I use it too. Very nice set. Looks good. Has a Christmas theme but we will use them year round.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Writer

customer_reviews.title: Product as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Great little set for Christmas time. The plates are plastic but don't have a cheap feel to them. We'll certainly use them for many Christmas' to come!
customer_reviews.author: B. Gerbracht

customer_reviews.title: Very cute dishes
customer_reviews.text: Very cute xmas dishes. I like that they are light weight and dishwasher safe. I will use these for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Bishoff

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are a little lighter weight but that's ok. I bought more of these so I had enoughvgor a buffet. Fun pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Dotty

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These have stood up well in the microwave and dishwasher over the past two months. We use them constantly and part of me doesn’t want to put them away now that the holidays are over!
customer_reviews.author: JLex

customer_reviews.title: Amazing plates
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous melamine plates and much thicker and sturdier than I expected. My kids are loving using this for the holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This was my second order for these super cute plates. A little disappointed one of the bowls had are bubbles and was peeling. Otherwise they are going to work for three Christmas gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Misti Holland

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: However it says made in US but on the box made in China
customer_reviews.author: carolin hoff

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set that looks just like the photos. The Santa design is so cute and was perfect for our Christmas feast!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Cheery addition to our table
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for to add some fun to our table around Christmas time. Heavyweight, easy to clean and dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt and Kati

customer_reviews.title: Thick sturdy dishes
customer_reviews.text: These are cute Christmas plates. If you don't have a big budget or need sturdy dishes, these are a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Ariela

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: These are stunning! True to color, sturdy. Much better quality than any other melamine dishes I've owned. One of my best purchased on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kim G.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in time for Holiday Festivities. Nice design.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and alternative to paper plate serving for a large stand up buffet party.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Takach Seligman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great seasonal addition to our holiday. Was hard to put away until next season
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light seasonal dishes!
customer_reviews.text: Love theses dishes!!! Perfect for large dinner parties. Light and non breakable.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Deschaine

customer_reviews.title: Charming melamine
customer_reviews.text: These dishes are even more charming in person than in photos. Reasonably lightweight, certainly more so than porcelain or china. I might even order another set; I'm sure I'll have these for years. I wish the dinner plates were sold separately, ideally in a set of 6 or 8, and even more ideally on amazon.fr, where they're currently not available. If they were, I'd have a set drop-shipped to my sister to match a table runner I gave her a few years ago. But I digress...for the domestic purchase for myself, I could not be happier. This set of dinner plates, salad plates, and bowls of Santa Comes Home are really charming and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Reader75

product_meta.title: Melange 12-Piece 100% Melamine Dinnerware Set (Santa Comes Home Collection ) | Shatter-Proof and Chip-Resistant Melamine Plates and Bowls | Dinner Plate, Salad Plate & Soup Bowl (4 Each)
product_meta.description: "Experience the Difference of an Authentic Melamine Dinner Set Upgrade your dinnerware set with one that blends superior durability, hassle-free maintenance, and rustic charm. Made using heavy weight melamine, these dinner plate and bowls are virtually unbreakable, keeps chips and cracks at bay, and can actually be cleaned in the dishwasher. Introduce some quirk to your dinner table with a beautiful melamine dinnerware set that doesnâ€™t cut corners. - Heavy duty feel and break-resistant design. - Comes in multiple pack options at a price youâ€™ll love. - Assorted colors - Dishwasher safe and 100% BPA-free. - Great for camping, RVs and outdoor use. Extra Dose of Durability Not all melamine dinner sets are created equal. Most come with a melamine content of between 30-60% that makes them weak, prone to cracks, and easy to shatter. But weâ€™ve taken the premium approach and used higher percentage of melamine to create dinner plates and bowls that beautifully weather the rigors of everyday use Great for Outdoors No need for paper plates. Whether youâ€™re going out camping, having an outdoor soiree, or setting off in your RV or trailer, our melamine plates and bowls complement it all with a touch of durability. Tough and hardy, this dinnerware set introduces a sense of normalcy to outdoor dining without any of the fragility. Maintenance Made Easy Get yourself melamine plates and bowls that you can actually clean in the dishwasher. While others break or crack while placed in there, our fully melamine dinner set can be safely cleaned without chipping the plates or ruining the design. Dine in Style Quirky yet cute, vintage yet modern, this colorful melamine dinnerware infuses any setting with a charm that never quits. The plates and bowls come in multiple colors and design options and are crowned by beautiful asymmetry. About Melange Melange dinnerware is all about treating you to everyday elegance. We believe fine dinner sets shouldnâ€™t mean fragile dinner sets. We believe every meal should be complemented by dinnerware that makes you smile. Thatâ€™s why weâ€™ve used premium materials to bring on the durability, special craftsmanship to enhance the longevity, and lovely detailing to catch anyoneâ€™s eye."
feature_bullets: HEAVY DUTY 100% MELAMINE: Unlike other melamine plates that scratch, break and chip due to their low 30%-60% melamine content, the Melange dinner set is crafted from 100% melamine that is thicker than most. This makes our melamine dinner set impressively shatter-proof, chip-resistant, and scratch-proof to treat you to extra durability.

GREAT EVERYDAY DINNER SET: This 12-piece rustic melamine dinnerware set comes with (4) 11” dinner plates, (4) 8.5” salad plates, and (4) 18 oz bowls that are great for both indoor and outdoor use. The break-resistant design makes this a nice kids’ melamine dinnerware set and also makes it ideal for camping or for use in RVs and trailers.

CONVENIENTLY DISHWASHER SAFE: While low quality melamine plates & bowls can’t be cleaned in the dishwasher, this premium 100% melamine dinnerware is uniquely dishwasher-safe to make clean-up a hassle-free affair. We’ve complemented the ease of maintenance with a BPA-free design to keep you and your family that much safer as you dine (not for use in the microwave or oven).

ALL ABOUT CHARACTER: Give your chow some charm with our melamine christmas dinnerware set. Our santa comes home collection combines an eye-catching holiday design with holiday colors and a simple modern shape to accentuate any setting with a heavy serving of character. Get a set for yourself and another as a gift for that someone with a taste for the unique.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We’re happy when you’re happy. That’s why we’ve backed this colorful melamine dinnerware set with our total satisfaction guarantee. If you have any questions or issues with your set simply reach out to us and we’ll do all we can to make it right. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now and start dining in style!
